name: Zcash Classic
tagline: Zcash Classic - Democratic ZeroCash with reduced Founders Reward
body:
### Welcome to Zcash Classic
Zcash Classic offers the same exact privacy and codebase as Zcash, with a significantly reduced Founders Reward of just 1%.

### Why Zcash Classic?
Zcash Classic is a decentralized platform that guarantees private financial transactions with ZK Snarks. Zcash Classic offers total payment confidentiality.

Zcash Classic is a continuation of the original Zcash project - the classic democratic version; free from the massive 10% Founders Reward found in Zcash.

### Sign up for Launch
You can be notified when we launch by signing up here: [http://zcashclassic.launchrock.com/](http://zcashclassic.launchrock.com/)

### Twitter
Feel free to add us on Twitter, and tweet about us at: [https://twitter.com/ZeroCashClassic](https://twitter.com/ZeroCashClassic)
